data.title: All God's Children (2012)
data.meta_description: Alina and her husband Peter, had lost his son in a car accident. They came to Moldova, Alina place of birth, trying to adopt a child. Păvălaş reminds him of his lost son. Irina fled from Italy and returned to find the child. She meets her friend, Tatiana, and together they go in search of Păvălaş.
data.text:
March Around the World 2022

26/30

Moldova

When going into a submission for the Best Foreign Language Oscar I expect a reasonable level of production value but I found this one really lacking in that department. Most of the technical aspects of this movie seemed sub-par, from the cinematography to the script and even the acting. Even bringing in accomplished overseas actors such as Michael Ironside didn't help. I will admit while the beginning was a little wonky, I did get more invested in the movie as it progressed as the tension did rise but as an overal package I just didn't really enjoy this one.

1/1 Moldovan Movies Ranked

136/167 Best Foreign Language Film Academy Award submissions Ranked
